title: Losing skins???
body: **I find God fist Lee sin in a reroll of 3 skin,  and now i no longer have it, why ?**

replies.body: How can i ask Support to check this ?

Restart your client, hextech crafting is buggy. If it is still gone, ask support.

I once opened the same chest twice, got two copies of the same fizz skin, then broke the client, and rerolled the same skins multiple times.
did that even wait few days still havnt got it back
